I'm always surprised by how much mileage you can get on the Internet. Sergio Marchionne said the 500 is a "unique expression of individuality" and designed to be customized. Donald Rumsfeld suggests that President Bush was at fault for not doing more to resolve disagreements among senior advisers. President Bush did not always receive, and may not have insisted on, a timely consideration of his options before he made a decision, nor did he always receive effective implementation of the decisions he made, Donald Rumsfeld wrote. We wanted to end this road trip the right way, said Marcus Camby , who had 15 rebounds. "In the first half, we didn't play particularly well.... The most memorable ad during Sunday's Super Bowl- Chrysler's two-minute spot featuring rap star Eminem- was a gut-wrenching decision for the carmaker's chief executive Sergio Marchionne . This was not an easy choice... apart from the money involved... and this is pretty expensive stuff, but you know, the choice of the topic, the choice of the characters in the thing were not easy choices. I had to think about this really long and hard, Sergio Marchionne said. Why? I asked him. "You know, I love Eminem but... the best season of his career, leading the Eagles to an NFC East title. "I'm enjoying the guys and I'm enjoying being out here playing football," he said. This is what you work for. You work hard to get in this position. I'm ecstatic to be here. Michael Vick was selected to start Sunday after leading the NFC with more than 1.5 million votes, far ahead of Minnesota Vikings running back Adrian Peterson , the NFC's second-leading vote-getter at 948,410.
